name: Zyan Malik
review: He provides absolutely an awesome travel guide. I really enjoyed the entire forest tour. At the beginning of our journey, he taught me and my team how to survive in the deep forest which was interesting.

name: Raihan Hossain
review: I have just come from my mountain tour. Two days ago, I and my friends set out for an exciting trip and we learned many survival tips and tricks of a mountain journey.  His precise guidelines helped us a lot.

name: Marium
review: Truly speaking, our sea beach journey was super fantastic. I make out the whole travel programme. I have learned to swim from him which is the most delightful memory of the journey for me.
